 Friday, June 17, 2005
 
 
 WASHINGTON - GOP leaders called on their Democratic counterparts Friday to denounce the comments of Sen. Dick Durbin (search), who earlier this week blasted the Guantanamo detainee camp.

Dennis Hastert, House Majority Leader Tom DeLay and three other GOP leaders.
 
 And Sen. Sam Brownback (search), R-Kan., told FOX News that he thinks Durbin's remarks are "clearly over the top."
